page.title: 16SPORT
page.content: Football is one of the main outdoor sports in Tomintoul. We have both senior and junior football teams which represent the village. Tomintoul School also has two teams. These school teams compete agsinst a Welsh touring team annually. Other sporting activities are outdoor and indoor bowls, tennis, badminton and darts. On the River Avon salmon fishing is a very popular sport with both local people and visitors. Some fishing also takes place on Conglass water. Many fishing enthusiasts stay in the Gordon Arms and Richmond Arms Hotels.
